name: pnp-list-site-externalusers
title: CLI - List all external users in all site collections
shortDescription: This script helps you to list all external users in all SharePoint Online sites.
longDescription: This script helps you to list all external users in all SharePoint Online sites. It provides insights in who the users are, and if available who they where invited by.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
